activation-email-sent: Activation email sent. Please check your inbox, including SPAM.
activation-email-sent-error: Activation email could not be sent
delete-account-p: If you are absolutely sure that you want to delete your account, type the word DELETE and press the button.
do-not-have-account: Don't have an account? Create an account.
email-contact-already-used: The email %email% is already registered. You can login with it.
email-not-verified: The email %email% is not verified. Open your email and look for an email from facturascripts.com with the verification link.
equivalent-page-desc: Una página es equivalente cuando tiene el mismo identificador
font-h1: Font and color for titles: h1
font-h2: Font and color for titles: h2
font-h3: Font and color for titles: h3
font-h4: Font and color for titles: h4
font-h5: Font and color for titles: h5
font-h6: Font and color for titles: h6
font-link: Font and color for links: a
footer-layout-help: Choose your footer layout. Depending on the number of columns, you will have a different number of areas to write content.
globalcss-help: This code will be placed in the head after all preloaded css, but before individual css loaded via blocks on the page.
globaljsfooter-help: This code will be placed in the footer after all the preloaded js, but before the individual js loaded via blocks on the page.
globaljshead-help: This code will be placed in the head after all the preloaded js, but before the individual js loaded via blocks on the page.
globalmeta-help: These meta tags will go below the theme meta tags but above the individual page meta tags.
hide-desktop-help: Disable this row for desktop devices entirely
hide-mobile-help: Disable this row for mobile devices entirely
hide-scrolling-down-help: Hides the sticky header when you scroll down the page. And it only shows when you scroll to the top
i-accept-terms: I accept the terms and conditions.
javascript-footer-help: This code will be placed in the footer after all the js.
javascript-head-help: This code will be located in the head after all the js.
login-to-continue-p: You need to log in to continue with this action. Click sign in or create an account.
login-with-social-or-email: If you prefer, you can identify yourself through your social networks.
make-sticky-help: Make this row sticky on parchment
meta-description-help: This description will be used for search engines.
modal-bottom-settings: Options at the bottom of the header
my-profile-p: From your profile you can see your data, change it, change your password or even delete your account.
page-css-help: This code will be placed in the head after all the css.
page-meta-help: This code will be placed in the head after all other meta tags.
page-not-found-p: We have not found the page you are looking for.
password-recovery-p: Le enviaremos un email con instrucciones para poder iniciar sesión. Si no lo recibe, compruebe la bandeja de SPAM o correo no deseado.
please-click-on-confirm-email: Please click on the following link to finish activating your account.
portal-access-denied-p: You do not have permission to view this section. The reason may be that you are logged in with a user who does not have permission to view this section.
position-toggle-mobile: Mobile menu button on the right
position-toggle-mobile-help: Move the mobile menu dropdown button to the right. By default it is on the left.
recover-email-send-ok: We have sent you an email so you can change your password.
recover-your-account-body: Press the button to recover access to your account. When logged in, please change your password.
register-available-help: Permite a los usuarios poder registrarse.
row-flex-layout-help: Determine the 'flexible layout' for this row
row-height-help: Determine the value of the header height in pixels
sticky-effect-help: You can choose between two types of sticky header effects
sticky-header-clone-help: Sticky header will clone header elements (logo, menu, search widget and shopping cart) and display them in one line
sticky-header-height-help: Determine header height for fixed header value in pixels
sticky-header-shadow-help: Add a shadow for the header when it's pasted
sticky-padding-body-help: Add a padding-top to the body equal to the height of the header.
text-color-fifth-help: You can use it with the .text-color-fifth css class.
text-color-first-help: You can use it with the .text-color-first css class.
text-color-heading-help: You can use it with the .text-color-heading css class.
text-color-link-help: You can use it with the .text-color-link css class.
text-color-link-hover-help: You can use it with the .text-color-link-hover css class.
text-color-quarter-help: You can use with the .text-color-quarter css class.
text-color-second-help: You can use it with the .text-color-second css class.
text-color-sixth-help: You can use it with the .text-color-sixth css class.
text-color-third-help: You can use it with the .text-color-third css class.
you-must-accept-cookies: You must accept the cookie policy
you-must-accept-privacy-policy: You must accept the privacy policy
you-must-accept-terms: You must accept the terms and conditions
